item.title: Moana 2's Post-Credits Scene Explained
item.description: Moana 2 includes a mid-credits scene that audiences can't miss, as the post-credits scene sets up what's next for Moana and Maui in Moana 3.

item.title: X-Men Star Michael Fassbender Addresses Rumors That Denzel Washington Will Play The MCU's Magneto
item.description: With the X-Men reboot on its way, Michael Fassbender responds to rumors that Denzel Washington will join the Marvel Cinematic Universe as Magneto.

item.title: New Looney Tunes Movie Finally Pays Off A 22-Year-Old Promise & I Couldn't Be Happier
item.description: With The Day The Earth Blew Up, the Looney Tunes franchise is finally paying off a promise that the series made to Daffy Duck over 20 years ago.
